sentence.Network_en: It would be foolish to generalize from a single example.
sentence.Network_cn: 仅从一个事例进行归纳的做法是愚蠢的。

sentence.Network_en: When we use " he " , we generalize for both sex.
sentence.Network_cn: 当我们用 he 时, 我们泛指男女.

sentence.Network_en: It's impossible to generalize about children's books, as they are all different.
sentence.Network_cn: 儿童读物五花八门, 不可能一概而论.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'reduce to a general statement'): from general + -ize

entry.def: If you generalize, you say something that seems to be true in most situations or for most people, but that may not be completely true in all cases.

example.ex: 'In my day, children were a lot better behaved'. — 'It's not true, you're generalizing'...
example.tran: “我们那个时候，孩子们要比现在听话许多。”——“不一定，你只是在一概而论。”

example.ex: It's hard to generalize about Cole Porter because he wrote so many great songs that were so varied.
example.tran: 科尔·波特写了这么多风格迥异的优美歌曲，要对他进行概括并不是件容易的事。

entry.def: If you generalize something such as an idea, you apply it more widely than its original context, as if it was true in many other situations.

example.ex: A child first labels the household pet cat as a 'cat' and then generalises this label to other animals that look like it.
example.tran: 孩子会先把家中的宠物猫称为“猫”，然后将其他像猫的动物都称为“猫”。

means.word_mean: 1. draw from specific cases for more general cases
3. cater to popular taste to make popular and present to the general public; bring into general or common use;

sentences.sentence: "Relativity Theory was vulgarized by these authors"

means.word_mean: 4. become systemic and spread throughout the body;

sentences.sentence: "this kind of infection generalizes throughout the immune system"

stems_affixes.word_buile: ad加强[有"向"之意+vert转+ize……化,做等→使转向→[做广告]使其注意……
ag一再+grand大+ize……化,做等→一再大→扩大[权力]等
civil公民的+ize……化,做等→v.使开化,使文明,教化
critic批评家+ize……化,做等→v.[criticise]批评,评论
ex出+orc巫术,邪魔+ize……化,做等→v.驱魔,去除[坏念头等]
fertile肥沃的+ize表动词→v.使受精;施肥于,使肥沃
general总的,大体的+ize……化,做等→v.归纳,概括,推广,普及
lion狮子+ize……化,做等→把人当狮子一样看→崇拜
material物质+ize……化,做等→v.赋予形体,实现
neutral中间的,中和的+ize……化,做等→v.使无效,中和
popular流行的+ize…化,使…→v.[使]大众化,[使]普及,推广
public公众的+ize……化,做等→v.宣传,引人注意

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使复活,使重新充满活力
stems_affixes.word_buile: re重新+vital生命的+ize……化,做等→重新活
steril无菌的+ize……化,做等→v.使不育,杀菌
tempor时间+ize……化→时间化→拖延时间

means.word_mean: 概括, 归纳, 推论

sentences.en: Our history teacher is always generalizing; he never deals with anything in detail.
sentences.cn: 我们的历史教师总爱概括地讲, 从不详述任何史实。

sentences.en: It is customary for the teacher to provide grammar notes to help the student generalize what he has learned.
sentences.cn: 教师经常给学生提供语法注释, 帮助他归纳所学到的东西。

sentences.en: They generalized the use of a new invention.
sentences.cn: 他们推广一项新发明的应用。

jushi.english: Our history teacher is always generalizing; he never deals with anything in detail.

jushi.chinese: 他们推广一项新发明的应用。
